algorithm_technique: Frequency counting of substrings to find the most frequent pattern.
problem_summary_simple: Make a string k-periodic by changing substrings of length k to match the most frequent one.
problem_summary_technical: Uses a Counter to find the most frequent k-length substring, then calculates operations based on total blocks and the most frequent block.
key_insights: A k-periodic string is formed by repeating a substring of length k.
The goal is to make all k-length blocks identical to the most frequent block.
The number of operations is the total number of blocks minus the count of the most frequent block.
